The Azerbaijan Democratic Independence Party (), also known as ADIP, was a political party in Azerbaijan.
It was founded by Gabil Huseynli on June 3, 1993, after a split from the Azerbaijan National Independence Party. The party was active until its dissolution around 2021, following a division in 1999.
